English: I'm on vacation starting from Monday.
I will work half-time starting from Tuesday.
Starting from Friday I will live alone.
The sun will shine until Monday.
I have to be ready by Tuesday.
I was late for the bus last Monday.
I go to the gym every Tuesday.
I travel from Wednesday till Friday.
Thursday is the best day of the week.
Hungarian: A csütörtök a hét legjobb napja

English: We eat in a restaurant on Fridays.
The building will be ready by Friday.

Hungarian: Ezen a szombaton van a húsvét

English: I plan not to smoke from Saturday on.
